column1: A memorial service will be conducted at 7:00 p.m. Monday
column3: 2015 at the Rowland H. Bailey Funeral Chapel of the Bailey-Kirk Funeral Home in Princeton with the Rev. Larry Dyer officiating.    The family will receive friends Monday
column5: 2015 from 5:00 p.m. until service hour at the Bailey-Kirk Funeral Home in Princeton.
